entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`courseId` TEXT NOT NULL, `duration` INTEGER NOT NULL, `is_deleted` INTEGER NOT NULL, `course_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `teacher_id` TEXT NOT NULL, `conversation_id` TEXT, `course_icon` TEXT, `course_created_date` INTEGER, `chat_type` TEXT, `report_status` INTEGER NOT NULL, `batch_started` TEXT NOT NULL, `voicecall_status` INTEGER NOT NULL, `is_group_active` INTEGER NOT NULL, `is_points_active` INTEGER NOT NULL, `is_course_locked` INTEGER NOT NULL, `is_course_bought` INTEGER NOT NULL, `expire_date` INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY(`courseId`))
